titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation prohibiting the exchange of monies for profit, the making of plate of any his Maiesties coynes, and the excessiue vse of gold and siluer foliate.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Bonham Norton, and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: White-hall, the fourth day of February, in the sixteenth yeere of our reigne ..
The date is given according to Lady Day dating.
Arms 13; Steele notation: date His 2) not Gilt,.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
